org.qbroker.event

Class EventSyslogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.event.EventSyslogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventAction

    public class EventSyslogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventAction
    EventSyslogger implements EventAction and logs a message to a syslogd via an UDP packet.

    This is MT-Safe.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com
